structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
The Land Court And Registration Of Title To Land

law.text: [ Text of section effective until July 1, 2012. For text effective July 1, 2012, see below.] Upon request of the chief justice, the sheriff of any county other than Suffolk shall assign a deputy to attend the sittings of the land court department in that county. The chief justice for administration and management shall appoint two officers for attendance upon the sessions of said court in Suffolk county. Chapter 185: Court officers [ Text of section as amended by 2011, 93, Sec. 28 effective July 1, 2012. See 2011, 93, Sec. 137. For text effective until July 1, 2012, see above.] Upon request of the chief justice, the sheriff of any county other than Suffolk shall assign a deputy to attend the sittings of the land court department in that county. The court administrator, in consultation with the chief justice of the trial court, shall appoint two officers for attendance upon the sessions of said court in Suffolk county.
